Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Anonymity \An`o*nym"i*ty\, n. The quality or state of being anonymous; anonymousness; also, that which anonymous. [R.] [1913 Webster]
He rigorously insisted upon the rights of anonymity. --Carlyle. [1913 Webster]
anonymity n : the state of being anonymous [syn: {namelessness}]
